node.name: Aesthene's Close, Central Vault
node.description: Interspersed with painted almagarus flower tiles, glittering cobblestone flooring stretches across the cavernous hold. A barrel vaulted ceiling adds more height to the already spacious chamber, its simple sloped arch curving between the stacked stone walls.

node.name: Aesthene's Close, Northern Vault
node.description: Interspersed with painted dirdel flower tiles, glittering cobblestone flooring stretches across the cavernous hold. A barrel vaulted ceiling adds more height to the already spacious chamber, its simple sloped arch curving between the stacked stone walls.

node.name: Aesthene's Close, The Vaults
node.description: Continuing to spiral in a slight incline, the gilded deobar planks are flanked by stacked stone walls. Thin streamers of glittery silk hang from gaethzen sconces in graceful twists and loops.

node.name: Aesthene's Close, Eastern Vault
node.description: Interspersed with painted tamarind tree tiles, glittering cobblestone flooring stretches across the cavernous hold. A barrel vaulted ceiling adds more height to the already spacious chamber, its simple sloped arch curving between the stacked stone walls.

node.name: Aesthene's Close, Southern Vault
node.description: Interspersed with painted horeb root tiles, glittering cobblestone flooring stretches across the cavernous hold. A barrel vaulted ceiling adds more height to the already spacious chamber, its simple sloped arch curving between the stacked stone walls.

node.name: Aesthene's Close, Western Vault
node.description: Interspersed with painted Elvish urn tiles, glittering cobblestone flooring stretches across the cavernous hold. A barrel vaulted ceiling adds more height to the already spacious chamber, its simple sloped arch curving between the stacked stone walls.

node.name: Aesthene's Close, The Vaults
node.description: Enclosed by stacked stone walls, gilded deobar planks form a graceful spiraling ramp with a gentle incline. Thin streamers of glittery silk hang from gaethzen sconces in festive swoops and swags.

node.name: Aesthene's Close, Crystal Chamber
node.description: The narrow, sloping sides of the vaulted ceiling create a mirror-like effect that amplifies the vivid colors that saturate the room's curved walls. Constantly shifting in their prismatic dance, brilliant rainbows emerge from a massive, glittering crystal that is suspended in mid-air at the very center of the room. Multiple open corridors branch away from the circular room, but an undulating, kaleidoscopic ward blocks access to all passageways except for the one to the north. An ornately gilded ramp, located directly beneath the crystal, leads downwards into another area.

node.name: Aesthene's Close, Corridor
node.description: Overlain with decorative wood slats, the stacked stone walls form a narrow passageway to traverse through. Tiny glittering tiles are pieced together into a colorful mosaic floor, depicting a pattern of swirling orlog faces. Flanked by gaethzen sconces, jewel-toned brocade tapestries bring a touch of softness to the long corridor.

node.name: Aesthene's Close, Chronoscape
node.description: Shifting rainbow hues pulse overhead, oscillating in a fluctuating random pattern amidst the shattered shards of a dark fathomless ceiling. Fractured orlogs are jumbled together and form a floor of wreckage that drifts aimlessly above a bottomless void.

node.name: Aesthene's Close, Chronoscape
node.description: Shifting red hues pulse overhead, oscillating in a fluctuating random pattern amidst the shattered shards of a dark fathomless ceiling. Fractured orlogs are jumbled together and form a floor of wreckage that drifts aimlessly above a bottomless void.

node.description: Shifting green hues pulse overhead, oscillating in a fluctuating random pattern amidst the shattered shards of a dark fathomless ceiling. Fractured orlogs are jumbled together and form a floor of wreckage that drifts aimlessly above a bottomless void.

node.description: Shifting blue hues pulse overhead, oscillating in a fluctuating random pattern amidst the shattered shards of a dark fathomless ceiling. Fractured orlogs are jumbled together and form a floor of wreckage that drifts aimlessly above a bottomless void.

node.description: Shifting indigo hues pulse overhead, oscillating in a fluctuating random pattern amidst the shattered shards of a dark fathomless ceiling. Fractured orlogs are jumbled together and form a floor of wreckage that drifts aimlessly above a bottomless void.

node.name: Aesthene's Close, Chronoscape
node.description: Shifting violet hues pulse overhead, oscillating in a fluctuating random pattern amidst the shattered shards of a dark fathomless ceiling. Fractured orlogs are jumbled together and form a floor of wreckage that drifts aimlessly above a bottomless void.

node.name: The Strand, Sandy Path
node.description: Following the roadside along the Oxenwaithe's bank, you are struck by the quiet beauty of the place. Taking pause to breathe in the crisp, clean air, you reflect on your surroundings. Sand, sparkling as if mixed with diamond dust, pours into deep blue undulating waters. A lush copse of trees spreads to the north, while to the southeast, a series of delightful small buildings is set back from the river's edge.

node.name: Foyer
node.description: Subdued lighting illuminates the tasteful wooden paneling of the room while a bevy of overstuffed furniture provides comfortable seating for those contemplating weighty choices. Thick plush carpets in a myriad of hues cover the floor, almost totally obscuring the pale wooden planks of the flooring. Around the walls, a number of colored archways contain magical portals that, when open, allow access to the prize rooms beyond. A large set of double doors allows access to rooms devoted to dispenser activities while a round opening leads to the area devoted to workshops for alterations.

Lighting illuminates the room which has carpets covering the floors. A number of colored archways contain magic portals that, when open, allow access to the prize rooms beyond. A set of double doors allows access to the dispensers while a round opening leads to the alteration area.
